name: Journey Into the Forest
description:
You are an explorer who has found a forest. Travel into its depths in order to find a sky unpolluted by light pollution, and learn a lot about light pollution and how you - yes, you! - can fight it in this educational little Bitsy game!

Created by Tehsin Ahmed, Ethan Smith, and Annabelle Carignan-Laing.

Music used was "Tissus" by Mathieu Lamontagne & Emmanuel Toledo, which you can find on the Free Music Archive. Game created using Bitsy by Adam Le Doux.
